text: O vy, kto veruyet! Yesli naydutsya sredi vas takiye, Kto otrechetsya ot religii svoyey, Gospod' drugikh lyudey postavit, Kotorykh budet On lyubit' I kto lyubit' budet Yego, - Smirennykh pered vernymi (Allakhu), Surovykh pred nevernymi (Yemu), Radeyushchikh na promysle Allakha, Besstrashnykh pered poritsaniyami tekh, kto poritsayet. I eto yest' Gospodnya milost', I On daruyet yeye tem, kogo sochtet, - Ved' On ob"yemlet vse i znayet obo vsem
